ComicInfo.Series: John Carpenter's Tales of Science Fiction: Vortex 2.0
ComicInfo.Summary:
Out in the Cat's Paw Nebula something evil is unfurling aboard the Barringer Habitat. Jake Dixon is back, but has he brought back with him the very thing he tried to destroy? As the body count begins to rise, more faces from the past, both dead and alive, begin to appear as an investigation begins... but is it already too late?
